title: The knowledge of college counselors in your pocket
text: “No more wasting hours browsing.” Cledge takes the best of college counseling combined with data analytics to provide you with the most relavant and credible resources relating to the application process.

section.title: Why Antd?
section.content: Ant Design is a React UI library that has a lot of easy-to-use components for building elegant UI.

section.title: Why styled-components?
section.content: Styled Components gives you total control over your components.
